TopicTitle: Edena Chronicles: Torvista, my second novel, is live!

Articles.Content:
3 years after I put my first novel (The Barrier Key) up on Amazon, its sequel is now available!  This one has some space travel in it, just in case that's a selling point for you.  You can get it here:

https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0749HX97S

If you missed the original novel, it can be found here:

https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00JDVR7T4

And if you're the sort of person who prefers a physical copy to read, paperbacks are available for both:

https://www.amazon.com/dp/1521948992
https://www.amazon.com/dp/1521950016

Enjoy!
